pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā āvasatho ḍayhati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.8: Yaṃ kiñci naṭṭhaṃ sabbaṃ amhe abhiyuñjissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.9: Thullanandā bhikkhunī punadeva taṃ āvasathaṃ paccāgantvā bhikkhuniyo pucchi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.13: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo āvasathe ḍayhamāne bhaṇḍakaṃ na nīharissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.14: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.15: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.16: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.19: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.21: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.22: “Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.8: bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā anissajjitvā parikkhittassa āvasathassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.9: Aparikkhittassa āvasathassa upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
